abstract: Updated: I’ve now had a chance to review the exclusivity agreement between Citigroup and Wachovia. The agreement provides that Citi and Wachovia will negotiate toward a transaction on the basis of a nonbinding term sheet with a target date of Oct. 6 to complete definitive documentation.
lead_paragraph: Updated: I’ve now had a chance to review the exclusivity agreement between Citigroup and Wachovia. The agreement provides that Citi and Wachovia will negotiate toward a transaction on the basis of a nonbinding term sheet with a target date of Oct. 6 to complete definitive documentation.

headline.main: Citi’s Upper Hand in the Wachovia Fight
